The group includes giants in the financial industry such at T. Rowe Price and BlackRock.
"As investors in companies that employ hundreds of thousands of people across your state, we ... want Texas to continue to thrive as a successful business environment and to be a financial leader in our country. However, discriminatory legislation that undermines these opportunities may hinder public and private investment, as well as the ability to raise capital, throughout your state," executives of major firms wrote.
